Agents.Base

Class BaseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agents.Base.BaseAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumanAction, ZombieAction

    public abstract class BaseAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Action
    Base class for the action classes of the agents of the zombie epidemic environment

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ActionType actionType
      Determines the type of action to perform
      protected Vector2D direction
      Determines the direction in which the action is performed (if necessary)

        public void setMove(double directionX,
           double directionY)
        Set the action to moving in a direction
        Parameters:

        directionY - the Y component of the direction

      • setMoveRotation

        public void setMoveRotation(double radians)
        Set the action to moving in a direction obtained by rotating the current direction
        Parameters:
        radians - the angle (expressed in radians) of the rotation

      • setMoveReflect

        public void setMoveReflect(Vector2D reflectionVector)
        Set the action to moving in a direction obtained by reflecting the current direction against an arbitrary vector
        Parameters:
        reflectionVector - the vector used to reflect the current direction
